testcase.name: User should able to view the results
testcase.system-out: Given Open anybrowser of choice and navigate to ebay home page..............passed When User enters search input "<searchvalue>" in search box.................passed And user selects the category "<category>" of choice........................passed And Click on search button..................................................passed And print the result of the product.........................................passed And display nth product details.............................................passed And Print all the products in first page....................................passed And print all the products along with scroll down...........................passed Then User should able to see the search results.............................passed
